products.name: Laser Engraving Machine
features: Set-up Smart Carver controller with 32-bit DSP chip for stable acceleration and moderation control
Automatic light decline compensation for perfect results
Full photosensitive resistor isolation system with high-speed differential input-output
USB 2.0 high-speed interface for safe and efficient data transmission
Improved precision with closed-loop control system for CMB series
Silica gel button interface, imported straight-line slide rail system, encoder module

products.name: Leather Cutting Machine
features: Equipped with metal conveyor belt for fabrics, cloth, textiles, hollow, plush toys
Compact layout ensures minimal material waste
Fly light path allows high-speed cutting
Smooth cutting and small kerfs, ideal for intricate patterns
Slip working table enables automatic feeding and receiving of materials
